channel.title: Susan Truppe
channel.description: Recent news about Susan Truppe, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: To all new students @westernu & @FanshaweCollege I'd like to welcome you to London. To returning students: welcome back! #ldnont

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Wishing students the best as they head back to school! #backtoschool #ldnont
